title: 8 card beater lot all different backs - SL and S460 - $75

posts.post_title: 8 card beater lot all different backs - SL and S460 - $75
posts.post_content:
Not pretty, but eight different backs including a Sovereign 460 and a Southern Leaguer.  $75 delivered paypal friends/family.

Emil BatchPB
